title: TikFinity | Text-to-Speech (TTS)
text: Let your chat comments be read out by our AI voices! Turn it into a benefit for your top supporters and enjoy additional support from your audience! Here you can read out the chat comments from your viewers automatically via Text-to-Speech (TTS). The voice is played directly in the browser. No Overlay is required! A TTS feature is also available via Actions & Events which offers more flexibility. (e.g. Read out gifts) To make the bot read out the chat comments, you need to start your TikTok Livestream and then connect TikFinity. Make sure that the TTS option is enabled on the TTS Configuration Page. With TikFinity, you can have your viewers' chat comments read aloud in real-time using Text-to-Speech (TTS). The voices are played directly in the browser â€“ no overlay required! Customize the volume, language, or voice to add a personal touch to your TikTok LIVE stream. This feature is perfect for boosting interaction with your audience and making your stream unforgettable. Make your viewers laugh with fun AI voices! Choose from a variety of voices, from humorous to unique character voices, and assign them to specific users or events. This feature is ideal for offering exclusive perks to special supporters like subscribers or team members, making your TikTok LIVE stream more interactive and entertaining. For even more flexibility, you can use Text-to-Speech through our Actions & Events feature. For example, have gifts, followers, or sub-emotes read aloud automatically to highlight special moments. This integration allows you to customize your stream and strengthen your audience engagement, which can boost your TikTok LIVE revenue. Sound Alerts for, e.g., gifts are available on this page.
